Number of signed / Number of received batches
This metrics doesn't account for batches you did not receive due to any connectivity issues

options.content: Mina
Obol

panels.description: Successful cluster duty percentage by type over the whole time range

targets.expr:
(
            sum(increase(core_tracker_participation_missed_total{duty="attester", peer="cloudy-game", env="$env"}[$__range])) by (peer) 
        /
            sum(increase(core_tracker_participation_expected_total{duty="attester", peer="cloudy-game", env="$env"}[$__range])) by (peer))

(
            sum(increase(core_tracker_participation_missed_total{duty=~".*proposer", peer="cloudy-game", env="$env"}[$__range])) by (peer) 
        /
            sum(increase(core_tracker_participation_expected_total{duty=~".*proposer", peer="cloudy-game", env="$env"}[$__range])) by (peer))

(
            sum(increase(core_tracker_participation_missed_total{duty!~"(proposer|attester)", peer="cloudy-game", env="$env"}[$__range])) by (peer) 
        /
            sum(increase(core_tracker_participation_expected_total{duty!~"(proposer|attester)", peer="cloudy-game", env="$env"}[$__range])) by (peer))

options.content: Substrate
Namada
XMTP
Capx
Cosmos

targets.expr: cometbft_consensus_height{env="$env", type="validator"} - ignoring(instance, job, endpoint, table_chain_id, chain, package, mainnet, version) cvms_block_height{env="$env", type="validator"}

options.content: Amplifier Votings
EVM Votings

targets.expr: sum((cvms_oracle_vote_window - on (chain_id) group_right cvms_oracle_miss_counter{env="$env"}) / on(chain_id) group_left cvms_oracle_vote_window) without (job, instance, package)

options.content: Flow Gateway
Immutable
Node Exporter

panels.description:
- *Load* - CPU capasity used (load average for last 1 minute divided by CPU cores count)
- *CPU* - CPU usage
- *Memory* - memory usage
- *Filesystem* - filesystem usage
- *Disk read* - maximum among all disks read rate
- *Dist write* - maximum among all disks write rate
- *Net recv* - maximum among all NIC's receive rate
- *Net trans* - maximum among all NIC's transmit rate
- *Net sock* - used network sockets 
- *TCP estab* - TCP established connections
- *TCP tw* - TCP sockets in TIME-WAIT status
